title: Reincarnated Villainess From Scratch - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Otome Game   Time Loop   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: 孤独の补番者
description:
She is also reincarnated as a villainess, why can other villainesses pull the flag and have a harem along the way, while she directly enters the scene of conviction?

Otaku Hanane accidentally crosses over to Alicia, the villainess of an Otome game, and meets the guillotine.

Wait, why did she return to the scene of conviction after her decapitation? Could this be the legendary [Death Return] skill?

The alternative villainess, what should she do to escape the dead end in another world?>
